name: Slette Mette
description:
Slette Mette has many challenges as a prime minister, she has to avoid journalist, delete text, remove minks, jump over striking nurses and much more.

It is the number 1 casual Game in Denmark on both Android and IOS. Now coming to you on Steam! How long can you stay in power, can you break the highscore? Can you become Slette Mette?

Slette Mette is a Endless Runner, where you have to jump over or interact with obstacles.

As seen on Tv2 God morgen Danmark.
TV2 News wrote "Have you tried 'Slette Mette'? Experts calls the game bad for the government"

Gameboy on Radio Loud feature the creator "The creator behind Slette Mette!"
